author: ops_lead
title: Beam to target established
content: 1.4 MW beam delivered to first target station at 08:00 EST. Second target receiving 700 kW.

author: rf_tech
title: SCL cavity gradient adjustment
content: Reduced gradient on SCL-5-2 by 0.5 MV/m due to field emission increase. Gradient optimization ongoing.

author: ops_1
title: Timing system glitch
content: Brief timing system hiccup at 12:28. Machine tripped but recovered automatically. No beam downtime.

author: cryo_eng
title: Cryogenic plant maintenance complete
content: Completed scheduled maintenance on He compressor #2. All parameters nominal. Ready for next run.

author: ops_2
title: Target temperature monitoring
content: First target station mercury temperature stable at 125C. Proton beam window readings nominal.

author: ops_lead
title: Night shift summary
content: Stable operations overnight. 1.4 MW average power. One minor timing glitch with auto-recovery. Neutron production on target.
